name: Vehicle(Official Glitch Edition)
description:
This work is a Windows version converted to HTML5, but it has strange bugs such as "enemy corpse multiply".
I tried to fix the bug, but it didn't work, so I will publish it.
Feel the difficulty of multi-platform development.

The following glitches have been confirmed.

  • Enemy character corpses multiply
  • Frame rate drop in some situations

ーーー

[Spoiler Alert!]
